metadata.name: Lac tol Pwr 50gm pck 204 mg Tablet

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used in the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis

contraindications.disease: Oral mouse LD sub 50 sub 350 mg kg Oral rat LD sub 50 sub 250 mg kg
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Niflumic acid a nonsteroidal anti inflammatory fenamate is a Ca sup 2 sup activated Cl sup sup channel blocker

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Diclofenac is combined with Niflumic acid
